resources.string:
1. You are supposed to make as many words as you can from the given set of letters in the grid. 
2. You can only select letters such that consecutive letters are neighbour to one another. 
3. The minimum valid word length is 4 i.e. "cars" is a valid word whereas "car" is not. 
4. If the submitted word is a valid one then it is added to the list and the score would be updated.

Hinix is a challenging word game inspired from the classic board trivia "Boggle". The app is open source at https://github.com/aviaryan/Hinix . 
 
Contributors: 
1. Avi Aryan 
2. Nilesh Chaturvedi 
3. Raju Koushik 
4. Saurabh Jain 

 
Version 2.5
